alert.note: Alert for McHenry; Pierce (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 5:27AM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHWESTERN PIERCE AND NORTHEASTERN MCHENRY COUNTIES THROUGH 600 AM CDT... At 527 AM CDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Towner, or 16 miles west of Rugby, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Pierce and northeastern McHenry Counties, including the following locations... Berwick. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
